CHAT.comment: GREEN TREE FINANCIAL CORPORATION ET AL., Petitioners v. LARKETTA RANDOLPH
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 11:05 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF CARTER G. PHILLIPS ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF JOSEPH M. SELLERS ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF CARTER G. PHILLIPS ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
(Whereupon, at 12:03 p.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
